name: 101 Pinball World
synopsis: Get ready for fast-paced pinball action with a twist! Complete special objectives to earn fun bonuses as you shoot your ball through pipes, up ramps and around mind-blowing obstacles. Choose from 2 game modes: Quick Play and Random and blast through over 100 fun tables in 4 exciting worlds filled with eye-popping details. Be a pinball wiz in “Wizard World”, go on a galactic adventure in “Alien Spaceship”, enjoy a spooky trip through “Halloween” and become a buccaneer in “Pirate's Bay”. Rack up enough points to top the High Scores and you'll be the pinball champ! Features: • 101 amazing tables in 4 unique worlds. • 3 player profiles and High Scores list. • Classic pinball gameplay enhanced with beautiful graphics. • Multiple special objectives earn extra points and power-ups. • Fun bonuses include table tilt, slow ball and immunity.
